sections.title: Strategic Guidance Led by Experience
sections.subhead: Clear thinking, grounded strategy, and forward motion.
body: This is not packaged consulting or generic advice. It is senior-level guidance shaped by years of corporate leadership and deep, hands-on work with Black-owned small businesses.

sections.title: Guidance For High-Stakes Decisions
body: This work is for Black founders who are navigating high-impact decisions without a trusted sounding board.
list: Are making high-impact decisions without a trusted sounding board
Feel stuck between vision and execution
Want direct, honest guidance rooted in real experience
bodyAfter: If you are looking for motivation or surface-level feedback, this may not be the right fit. If you want thoughtful partnership and direction, you are in the right place.

sections.title: A Dual Perspective
body: Amanda Johnson has spent her career inside environments where the stakes are real.

She has led strategy and marketing work inside large organizations, partnered with senior executives, and owned initiatives tied directly to revenue, reputation, and growth. She understands how decisions are made, how power operates, and how ideas move from proposal to execution.
She has also worked closely with Black-owned small businesses navigating limited access, unclear systems, and uneven support. She understands what it means to build without a safety net.
That dual perspective shapes every engagement.

inlineLink.label: Learn more about Amanda and the origin of Cupcakes + Broccoli

sections.title: A Strategic Partner, Not a Task-Taker
body: Amanda works as a strategic partner, not a task-taker.
Her approach is collaborative, direct, and grounded in reality. She listens closely, asks the right questions, and helps founders make decisions they can stand behind.
People who work with Amanda often describe her as clear, detail-oriented, calm under pressure, and deeply invested in seeing work through execution.
She does not disappear after the idea. She stays with the work.

sections.eyebrow: What Working Together Can Look Like
sections.title: Engagements Are Tailored
body: Engagements are intentionally flexible and tailored to each founder’s needs. Work may include:
list: Navigating moments of transition or uncertainty
Acting as a trusted thought partner during growth or change
bodyAfter: This is consultative work shaped around context, not templates.

sections.title: How This Fits With Membership
body: Many founders begin their relationship with Cupcakes + Broccoli through Membership.
Membership provides access to tools, frameworks, shared learning, and ongoing context. Consulting builds on that foundation for founders who want deeper, more personalized support.

sections.eyebrow: Blind Dinners and the Broader Ecosystem
sections.title: Trust and Shared Perspective
body: Blind Dinners are part of the larger Cupcakes + Broccoli ecosystem.

They are invitation-based gatherings designed to foster trust, conversation, and shared perspective among Black founders. While not a consulting product, they often deepen relationships and reinforce community.

sections.title: Request to Work With Amanda
body: Amanda works with a limited number of founders at a time to ensure depth and care.
If you are interested in working together, the first step is to share where you are and what you are navigating. From there, we can determine whether it is a good fit.
